nodes.text: Star Wars 3-D is a three-issue Legends comic book miniseries written by Len Wein and John Stephenson. It was published by Blackthorne Publishing as a part of the Blackthorne 3-D Series from 1987 to 1988.

The issues were originally printed with a red/blue "3-D" effect and were each packaged with a pair of 3-D glasses. Black-and-white versions of the issues were later collected in Star Wars Omnibus: Wild Space Volume 1 (2013) and Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: The Rebellion Vol. 3 (2019).
